I currently have an opportunity that may match your skills. Please review the job description and let me know whether or not you (or someone you know) might be interested.
, Permanent
Specialization: Software Development
Candidate Required: J2EE Application and Integration Specialist
Skill Level: Intermediate
Opportunity Description: Our client is looking for a J2EE Application and Integration Specialist to provide technical guidance, analysis, design and development of application integration of various systems.
Under the guidance of Team Lead, formulate and define systems scope, objectives, requirements, analysis, design and development based on both user needs and a good understanding of application business systems and industry standards.
Resource Responsibilities:
1. Provide integration services to projects by designing/developing J2EE solution frameworks and integrating enterprise solutions using EAI/ Middleware solutions 2. Provide Application/Integration Design and Development for projects 3. Define message definitions and requirements and define Integration Project Plan 5. Design information systems to perform well logically and physically for decision support 6. Coordinate new development and ensure it is consistent and well integrated with existing information structure 7. Support integration testing, user acceptance testing and implementation 8. Assist in post-implementation continuous improvement effects to enhance performance and provide increased functionality 9. Provide after-hours support for integration components, middleware adapters/wrappers and interfaces. Occasional off-hours on-site support to resolve emergency production problems
Other Resource Requirements:
• Familiar with mainframe, Java and J2EE development and advise on best practices and solutions • Knowledge in Integration and Middleware technology and in Web Services and Middleware: WebSphere MQ, Message Broker, WebSphere Application Server • Knowledge in development methodologies and testing standards • Knowledge in Program Languages/Development Tools: Java, HTML, XML, RAD, J2EE, OOA/OOD/OOP
Specialization and Skills: Software Development J2EE 5 - 7 years
Additional Requirements: Skill Name Experience
Full understanding of Unix, Windows, Middleware and web-based technologies Mandatory
Experience in developing system/technical integration specifications Mandatory
Experience in working with DB2/UDB, SQL Server, and Oracle Proficient
Experience in Integration infrastructure design and implementation Proficient
Experience in interface metadata repository management Proficient
Experience in providing end-to-end solutions incorporating legacy systems Proficient
Work Environment: Downtown location.
Average Expectation of Tenure in this job: 1yr
